parameters.name: Osc 1 Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for oscillator 1.

parameters.name: Osc 2 Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for oscillator 2.

parameters.name: Noise Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for the noise oscillator.

parameters.name: Waveform Osc 1
parameters.description: The waveform for oscillator 1

parameters.name: Waveform Shape Osc 1
parameters.description: The waveform shape for oscillator 1 allows you to modify the pulse with of the waveform.

parameters.name: Waveform Osc 2
parameters.description: The waveform for oscillator 2

parameters.name: Waveform Shape Osc 2
parameters.description: The waveform shape for oscillator 2 allows you to modify the pulse with of the waveform.

parameters.name: Octave Osc 1
parameters.description: The octave for oscillator 1

parameters.name: Octave Osc 2
parameters.description: The octave for oscillator 1

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Attack Time
parameters.description: The ATTACK specifies the time required for the EG to reach its maximum level once a new note is played.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Decay Time
parameters.description: The DECAY specifies the time required for the EG to fall to the preset Sustain level once the Attack portion of the EG is complete.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Sustain Level
parameters.description: The SUSTAIN specifies the level that will be maintained while the key is held down (or a trigger is applied).

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Release Time
parameters.description: The RELEASE specifies the time required for the EG to reach its minimum level (zero) once the key or trigger is released.

parameters.name: Filter Cutoff
parameters.description: This knob is used to set the cutoff frequency. Harmonic content above the cutoff frequency will be filtered out. If the CUTOFF value is set too low, the volume may be extremely low.

parameters.name: Resonance
parameters.description: Also known as Peak or Q, the RESONANCE control adds additional emphasis to the overtones occurring at the CUTOFF frequency, giving a distinctive character to the sound. Turning the value up will increase the resonance effect. TIP The overtones that are emphasized will change depending on the cutoff frequency. For this reason, it's good to adjust the CUTOFF knob while adjusting the RESONANCE knob. When emphasizing the overtones in this way, the sound may distort depending on the cutoff frequency or the input audio.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Amount
parameters.description: The Filter Envelope Generator can be used to control the CUTOFF, or Filter frequency, over time using this setting. With this value is 64 (center position), no EG is applied to the Filter. Values <64 increases the EG intensity, but with the polarity of the EG inverted. Values >64 increases the EG intensity effect.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Attack Time
parameters.description: Attack time for the filter envelope.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Decay Time
parameters.description: The DECAY specifies the time required for the EG to fall to the preset Sustain level once the Attack portion of the EG is complete.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Sustain Level
parameters.description: The SUSTAIN specifies the level that will be maintained while the key is held down (or a trigger is applied).

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Release Time
parameters.description: The RELEASE specifies the time required for the EG to reach its minimum level (zero) once the key or trigger is released.

parameters.name: LFO Waveform
parameters.description: The LFO can be set to a square wave, a triangle wave, or a sawtoothwave.

parameters.name: LFO Rate
parameters.description: The rate parameter adjusts the speed of the LFO. Increasing the value increases the LFO speed.

parameters.name: LFO depth
parameters.description: This parameter adjusts the intensity of the LFO, from 0 = low intensisty to 127 high intensity.

parameters.name: LFO Target
parameters.description: Selects the parameter where the LFO modulation will be applied. CUTOFF: Modulation is applied to the FILTER CUTOFF knob setting. SHAPE: Modulation is applied to the VCO 1, 2 SHAPE knob settings. PITCH: Modulation is applied to the VCO 1, 2 PITCH knob settings.
